Title: Thelma
Produced by:
Zoë Worth 
 Chris Kaye 
 Nicholas Weinstock 
 Benjamin Simpson 
 Karl Spoerri 
 Viviana Vezzani
Starring:
June Squibb 
 Fred Hechinger 
 Richard Roundtree 
 Parker Posey 
 Clark Gregg 
 Malcolm McDowell
Reception: On review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 98% of 43 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 7.7/10. The website's critics consensus reads, "A stellar showcase for the talented June Squibb, Thelma avoids cheap laughs as it finds the lighter side of some serious issues."
